string-array.name: rule_array
string-array.item: \u2022 For each question there will be 4 options out of which only 1 is correct.
\u2022 You have 10 seconds to answer each question.
\u2022 Maximum score for each question is 100 , scores are given depending upon how quickly you answer.
\u2022 If a wrong answer is given or No option is selected , no score is given.
